## plain text ######################################
-- text --
I am a plain text, encrypt me!
-- bit string --
010010010010000001100001011011010010000001100001
001000000111000001101100011000010110100101101110
001000000111010001100101011110000111010000101100
001000000110010101101110011000110111001001111001
011100000111010000100000011011010110010100100001

## encrypted text ##################################
-- bit string --
111011110101111011111111001111110000110100011100
010110010000011011011010010101010001100010110011
001111110011011101111101111101000000100111100000
101001111001110100001000010011000011000011001111
111000111011110110100110000101110000001111010001
1100111111111101

## decrypted text ##################################
-- text --
I am a plain text, encrypt me!
-- bit string --
010010010010000001100001011011010010000001100001
001000000111000001101100011000010110100101101110
001000000111010001100101011110000111010000101100
001000000110010101101110011000110111001001111001
011100000111010000100000011011010110010100100001

encryption succeed
